data.body:
Objective: Enumerate all current beads touchpoints and required behavior before refactoring.

Notes: All tasks can run in parallel; this wave produces the contract input set.

Assigned tasks:
- Inventory direct beads usage across the repository
- Map required workflows to backend operations
- Capture current failure modes and edge cases
- Create characterization test matrix for current behavior
